targets.rawSql: SELECT total_sleep/3600.0 as "Total" FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT efficiency FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT average_hrv FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT lowest_heart_rate FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT latency/60.0 as "Latency" FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT average_breath FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT deep_sleep/60.0 as "Deep", light_sleep/60.0 as "Light", rem_sleep/60.0 as "REM", awake_time/60.0 as "Awake" FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT day as time, deep_sleep/3600.0 as "Deep" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, deep_sleep FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, light_sleep/3600.0 as "Light" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, light_sleep FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day
SELECT day as time, rem_sleep/3600.0 as "REM" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, rem_sleep FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, awake_time/3600.0 as "Awake" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, awake_time FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

WITH sr AS (
  SELECT * FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
), bounds AS (
  SELECT min(i) as lo, max(i) as hi
  FROM sr, generate_series(0, length(sleep_phase_5_min)-1) as i
  WHERE substr(sleep_phase_5_min, i+1, 1) IN ('1','2','3')
)
(
  SELECT
    sr.bedtime_start + (i * interval '5 minutes') as time,
    CASE substr(sr.sleep_phase_5_min, i+1, 1)
      WHEN '1' THEN 'Deep'
      WHEN '2' THEN 'Light'
      WHEN '3' THEN 'REM'
      WHEN '4' THEN 'Awake'
      ELSE 'Unknown'
    END as "Phase"
  FROM sr,
       generate_series(0, length(sr.sleep_phase_5_min)-1) as i,
       bounds b
  WHERE i >= b.lo AND i <= b.hi
)
UNION ALL
(
  SELECT
    sr.bedtime_start + ((b.hi + 1) * interval '5 minutes') as time,
    NULL as "Phase"
  FROM sr, bounds b
)
ORDER BY time

WITH sr AS (
  SELECT * FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
), bounds AS (
  SELECT min(i) as lo, max(i) as hi
  FROM sr, generate_series(0, length(sleep_phase_5_min)-1) as i
  WHERE substr(sleep_phase_5_min, i+1, 1) IN ('1','2','3')
)
SELECT
  (extract(epoch from sr.bedtime_start + ((item.ordinality - 1) * interval '5 minutes')) * 1000)::bigint as "Time",
  (item.value)::numeric as "Heart Rate"
FROM sr,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(sr.heart_rate->'items') WITH ORDINALITY as item,
     bounds b
WHERE item.ordinality - 1 >= b.lo AND item.ordinality - 1 <= b.hi
  AND item.value IS NOT NULL AND item.value <> 'null' AND item.value <> ''
ORDER BY 1

WITH sr AS (
  SELECT * FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day = '$night' ORDER BY total_sleep DESC LIMIT 1
), bounds AS (
  SELECT min(i) as lo, max(i) as hi
  FROM sr, generate_series(0, length(sleep_phase_5_min)-1) as i
  WHERE substr(sleep_phase_5_min, i+1, 1) IN ('1','2','3')
)
SELECT
  (extract(epoch from sr.bedtime_start + ((item.ordinality - 1) * interval '5 minutes')) * 1000)::bigint as "Time",
  (item.value)::numeric as "HRV"
FROM sr,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(sr.hrv->'items') WITH ORDINALITY as item,
     bounds b
WHERE item.ordinality - 1 >= b.lo AND item.ordinality - 1 <= b.hi
  AND item.value IS NOT NULL AND item.value <> 'null' AND item.value <> ''
ORDER BY 1
SELECT day as time, average_hrv as "HRV" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, average_hrv FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, avg(average_hrv) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as "7d Avg" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, average_hrv FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, lowest_heart_rate as "Lowest HR" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, lowest_heart_rate FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, efficiency as "Efficiency" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, efficiency FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day::text as "Date", contributors_deep_sleep as "Deep Sleep", contributors_efficiency as "Efficiency", contributors_latency as "Latency", contributors_rem_sleep as "REM Sleep", contributors_restfulness as "Restfulness", contributors_timing as "Timing", contributors_total_sleep as "Total Sleep" FROM daily_sleep WHERE $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day DESC

SELECT day as time, latency/60.0 as "Latency (min)" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, latency FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, avg(latency/60.0) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as "7d Avg" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, latency FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT day as time, average_breath as "Breaths/min" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (day) day, average_breath FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND $__timeFilter(day) ORDER BY day, total_sleep DESC) sub ORDER BY day

SELECT CASE WHEN optimal_bedtime_start IS NOT NULL THEN to_char((timestamp '2000-01-02 00:00:00' + (optimal_bedtime_start * interval '1 second'))::time, 'HH24:MI') || ' - ' || to_char((timestamp '2000-01-02 00:00:00' + (optimal_bedtime_end * interval '1 second'))::time, 'HH24:MI') ELSE initcap(replace(recommendation, '_', ' ')) END as "Bedtime" FROM sleep_time WHERE day <= ($__timeTo()::timestamptz)::date ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT initcap(replace(recommendation, '_', ' ')) as "Recommendation" FROM sleep_time WHERE day <= ($__timeTo()::timestamptz)::date ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT day as time, count(*) as "Naps" FROM sleep WHERE type IN ('late_nap', 'rest') AND $__timeFilter(day) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day

list.name: night
list.label: Night
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT day::text FROM sleep WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day >= '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}'::date AND day <= '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}'::date ORDER BY 1 DESC
